verbs.description: [ARG0: halloween trickster] [V: has] [ARG1: change of heart] returns stolen girl scouts scarecrow with apology letter and donation the person who took juliet the scarecrow apparently had a change of heart surveillance footage on friday shows the scarecrow being returned to its rightful owner being placed back on the front porch of a home nbc new york bayside queens juliet
